txt.en: 'I think it is much better if the Rohirrim find these lands haunted; do you not agree? They will not disturb us again for two, maybe three generations. Then perhaps we will have to frighten them away once more.'
A Gentle Nudge
The fisherman's nerves seem shaken
This is a good place to hide
The fisherman seems frightened

The fishermen's camp can be found along the banks of the Anduin in Thinglad.

You should sneak to the camp, crouch in some undergrowth nearby, and perform tricks to try to frighten away the men.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest uses emotes. You must target the intended recipient of the emote in order for quest emotes to work.</rgb>
This is a good place to hide
Wait a few moments before continuing.
The fisherman trembles with fear

The fishermen's camp can be found along the banks of the Anduin in Thinglad.

You should sneak to the camp, crouch in some undergrowth nearby, and perform tricks to try to frighten away the men.

Wait a few moments before trying again.
That seemed to do the trick

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest uses emotes. You must target the intended recipient of the emote in order for quest emotes to work.</rgb>
Noriel has retreated to the Elf-ruins of Haldirith in Thinglad, at the centre of the forest, upon a hill.\n\nYou should speak with Noriel.
From a hiding place, <rgb=#FF0000>whistle</rgb> at the nearby fisherman to scare him
Wait a few moments
From a hiding place, <rgb=#FF0000>mumble</rgb> at the nearby fisherman to scare him
Wait a few moments
From a hiding place, <rgb=#FF0000>roar</rgb> at the nearby fisherman to scare him
Wait a few moments
From a hiding place, <rgb=#FF0000>clap</rgb> at the nearby fisherman to scare him
Find the Elf-outpost of Haldirith
Noriel wants you to frighten away the fishermen who have set up nets along the banks of the Anduin in Thinglad.

'The Rohirrim have always believed our kind are evil, and that Lothl√≥rien is a haunted place. We feel that this is not entirely a bad belief for them to hold, as it will frighten them away from our borders.\n\n'I had the idea that you could crouch hidden near their camp and make strange noises to frighten the fishermen away. Hopefully, we will not need to resort to more force than simple manipulation.'
